title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210(GTK2 only), the scrollbars are enabled. They can be moved around, but they don't have any effect. When opening a small image, like an icon, the scrollbars are misleading because they don't do anything.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210(GTK2 only)
2. Open the ImageAnalyzer example
3. Observe that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they don't have any effect
4. Open a small image, such as an icon, and notice that the scrollbars are misleading because they don't do anything
